\noindent{\color{outcolor}    c("null", "R", "EXCEL", "TCL")), env = parent.frame()) }
\noindent{\color{outcolor}\{}
\noindent{\color{outcolor}    detachXL <- attachXL(env)}
\noindent{\color{outcolor}    on.exit(detachXL(), add = TRUE)}
